Title: Healing Crystals
Description:
Greetings! 

Apologies if I seem... distracted. I have been beside myself worrying about my injured friends. 

But maybe you, gentle$c, can assist us?

Narvra needs aid in healing us. Shards from crystal elementals have healing properties. I feel terrible asking to harm a fellow elemental, but if you could... obtain some from them, that would greatly aid my friends.

Don't worry--the elementals will regenerate in time. My friends' needs come first, however impolite our gathering methods may be.
ObjectivesText: Collect 10 Viridian Heartcrystals from enemies in the Viridian Throne.
